body_html: I'm even wondering whether we should even keep the cache live when any of train(), eval(), predict() exit. They're all meant to be long running and ideally shouldn't leave open file handles hanging around.
body_text: I'm even wondering whether we should even keep the cache live when any of train(), eval(), predict() exit. They're all meant to be long running and ideally shouldn't leave open file handles hanging around.
body: I'm even wondering whether we should even keep the cache live when any of train(), eval(), predict() exit. They're all meant to be long running and ideally shouldn't leave open file handles hanging around.
